entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this morning. High minus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 28 April 2016
